entries.title: Your iPhone videos will never look like the ones Apple shows you
entries.description: Sorry. A $1000+ smartphone doesn't turn you into Steven Spielberg.

entries.title: Before Kevin Costner hit it big, he starred in a very 80s Apple commercial
entries.description: Forty years later, we take a quick look back at one of Apple's biggest failures…and the future movie star who helped promote it.

entries.title: I tried Delta's new free inflight Wi-Fi. Here's how fast it was
entries.description: Delta's new free inflight internet service is better and more stable than earlier services and free to all SkyMiles members.

entries.title: Amazon thinks these are the best Valentine's gadgets and I'm not in love
entries.description: I fear Amazon struggles with the idea of romance. And love. And, perhaps, humanity.

entries.title: Apple couldn't fix it, AT&T couldn't fix it. One man's descent into iPhone torment
entries.description: Let's add T-Mobile's role in this mess. Oh, and Tim Cook's. You'll be glad this didn't happen to you.

entries.title: Stop doomscrolling: How to set screen time limits on your iPhone
entries.description: Save yourself from endlessly scrolling by setting app limits on your iPhone.

entries.title: Microsoft says I should be more creative with Excel, so I took the bait
entries.description: Are these Microsoft suggestions really things you'd ever do? Except for, perhaps, one of them.
